data.comment: The big names in today's match at Olympiastadion have now been confirmed.
The match has started at Olympiastadion.
In the minute 1, Goal kick for Wolfsburg at Olympiastadion.
Wolfsburg awarded a throw-in in their own half.
Free kick for Hertha in their own half.
In the minute 3, Wolfsburg are too eager and fall into an offside trap.
Throw-in for Wolfsburg at Olympiastadion.
Wout Weghorst (Wolfsburg) goes for goal but the shot is blocked by an alert defence.
In the minute 5, Hertha awarded a free kick in their own half.
Goal! The home team take a 1-0 lead through Matheus Cunha.
Dodi Lukebakio instrumental with a fine assist.
In the minute 8, Wolfsburg have been awarded a corner by Martin Petersen.
Can Wolfsburg capitalize from this throw-in deep inside Hertha's half?
Throw-in for Hertha in the half of Wolfsburg.
In the minute 10, Jhon Cordoba (Hertha) is first to the ball but his header is off-target.
Wolfsburg have a goal kick.
Throw-in for Wolfsburg in their own half.
In the minute 11, Martin Petersen signals a free kick to Wolfsburg in their own half.
In Berlin a free kick has been awarded the home team.
Ball safe as Hertha is awarded a throw-in in their half.
In the minute 14, Martin Petersen signals a Wolfsburg throw-in in Hertha's half.
Corner awarded to Wolfsburg.
Ball goes out of play for a Hertha goal kick.
In the minute 16, Throw-in Hertha.
Martin Petersen awards the away team a throw-in.
Josip Brekalo of Wolfsburg smashes in a shot on target. The keeper saves, though.
In the minute 18, Wolfsburg pushes forward through Yannick Gerhardt, whose finish on goal is saved.
Martin Petersen signals a free kick to Hertha in their own half.
Wolfsburg to take a throw-in in Hertha territory.
A throw-in for the away team on the opposite half.
In the minute 20, Goal! Ridle Baku levels the match at 1-1.
Maximilian Philipp with an assist there.
In the minute 22, Can Hertha get the ball into an attacking position from this throw-in in Wolfsburg's half?
A throw-in for the away team on the opposite half.
Corner awarded to Wolfsburg.
In the minute 25, Martin Petersen awards the home team a throw-in.
Wolfsburg awarded a free kick in their own half.
Free kick for Wolfsburg in their own half.
In the minute 27, Ball safe as Hertha is awarded a throw-in in their half.
Martin Petersen signals a Hertha throw-in in Wolfsburg's half.
Hertha have been awarded a corner by Martin Petersen.
In the minute 29, Matheus Cunha (Hertha) strikes at Olympiastadion but his header is cleared.
Martin Petersen signals a free kick to Hertha.
Hertha are whistled for offside.
In the minute 31, Corner awarded to Wolfsburg.
Martin Petersen awards Hertha a goal kick.
In Berlin Hertha attack through Dodi Lukebakio. The finish is off target, however.
In the minute 32, It's a goal kick for the away team in Berlin.
Throw-in Wolfsburg.
Throw-in for Hertha in the half of Wolfsburg.
In the minute 33, Hertha's Peter Pekarik gets in a shot on goal at Olympiastadion. But the effort is unsuccessful.
Throw-in for Hertha in their own half.
Throw-in for Hertha close to the penalty box.
In the minute 35, Hertha have been awarded a corner by Martin Petersen.
Hertha drive upfield and Dedryck Boyata gets in a shot. The strike is blocked by a Wolfsburg defender.
Wolfsburg awarded a throw-in in their own half.
In the minute 39, Can Wolfsburg get the ball into an attacking position from this throw-in in Hertha's half?
Wolfsburg have a dangerous throw-in.
Peter Pekarik for Hertha gets in a strike but fails to hit the target.
In the minute 40, Wolfsburg have a goal kick.
Wolfsburg's Xaver Schlager misses with an attempt on goal.
Martin Petersen awards Hertha a goal kick.
In the minute 41, Hertha to take a throw-in in Wolfsburg territory.
Corner awarded to Hertha.
Free kick Hertha.
In the minute 43, Wolfsburg drives forward and Jerome Roussillon gets in a shot. Without netting, however.
Wolfsburg needs to be cautious. Hertha have an attacking throw-in.
Free kick for Hertha in the half of Wolfsburg.
In the minute 45, A throw-in for the away team on the opposite half.
Ball goes out of play for a Hertha goal kick.
Throw-in for Hertha in the half of Wolfsburg.
In the minute 45, Martin Petersen signals a free kick to Hertha.
The ref's whistle signals the end of the first-half.
The second-half has just kicked-off.
In the minute 46, Throw-in for Hertha at Olympiastadion.
Matheus Cunha for Hertha is back on the field again.
Play has been temporarily suspended for attention to Matheus Cunha for Hertha who is writhing in pain on the pitch.
In the minute 48, Hertha advance rapidly upfield but Martin Petersen blows for offside.
Wolfsburg will need to be alert as they defend a dangerous free kick from Hertha.
Hertha's Matheus Cunha is on target but unsuccessful.
In the minute 51, Martin Petersen signals a Hertha throw-in in Wolfsburg's half.
Hertha's Matheus Cunha breaks free at Olympiastadion. But the strike goes wide of the post.
Goal kick for Wolfsburg at Olympiastadion.
In the minute 52, Wolfsburg push forward at Olympiastadion and Yannick Gerhardt gets in a strike. This is blocked, however, by a determined Hertha defence.
Wolfsburg have been awarded a corner by Martin Petersen.
Dodi Lukebakio gets his shot on target but fails to score for Hertha.
In the minute 53, Hertha have been awarded a corner by Martin Petersen.
Martin Petersen signals a throw-in for Hertha, close to Wolfsburg's area.
Hertha to take a throw-in in Wolfsburg territory.
In the minute 56, Can Hertha get the ball into an attacking position from this throw-in in Wolfsburg's half?
Throw-in for Wolfsburg at Olympiastadion.
Hertha make their first substitution with Matteo Guendouzi replacing Lucas Tousart.
In the minute 58, Hertha drive forward at breakneck speed but are pulled up for offside.
Throw-in for Hertha in the half of Wolfsburg.
Corner awarded to Hertha.
In the minute 63, Free kick Hertha.
Corner awarded to Hertha.
Dedryck Boyata (Hertha) gets in a strike but the shot is blocked by a defender.
In the minute 65, In Berlin a free kick has been awarded the home team.
The away team have replaced Josip Brekalo with Joao Victor. This is the first substitution made today by Oliver Glasner.
In the minute 66, Throw-in high up the field for Hertha in Berlin.
Oliver Glasner (Wolfsburg) is making a second substitution, with Admir Mehmedi replacing Maximilian Philipp.
Wolfsburg push upfield but Martin Petersen quickly pulls them for offside.
Wolfsburg have been awarded a corner by Martin Petersen.
In the minute 68, A throw-in for the away team on the opposite half.
Ball safe as Hertha is awarded a throw-in in their half.
Hertha awarded a throw-in in their own half.
In the minute 69, Free kick for Wolfsburg in their own half.
Martin Petersen signals a Hertha throw-in in Wolfsburg's half.
Throw-in Wolfsburg.
In the minute 71, Throw-in high up the field for Wolfsburg in Berlin.
Can Wolfsburg get the ball into an attacking position from this throw-in in Hertha's half?
Jhon Cordoba (Hertha) is given an opening but the shot is blocked by a defender.
In the minute 73, Hertha have been awarded a corner by Martin Petersen.
It's a goal kick for the away team in Berlin.
The home team replace Maximilian Mittelstadt with Marvin Plattenhardt.
In the minute 74, Javairo Dilrosun is replacing Dodi Lukebakio for Hertha at Olympiastadion.
It's getting dangerous! Free kick for Wolfsburg close to the penalty box.
Marvin Plattenhardt (Hertha) has received a yellow card from Martin Petersen.
In the minute 78, Wout Weghorst (Wolfsburg) gets up for a header but cannot keep the ball on target.
It's a goal kick for the home team in Berlin.
Hertha to take a throw-in in Wolfsburg territory.
In the minute 78, Martin Petersen signals a free kick to Wolfsburg in their own half.
Can Hertha capitalize from this dangerous free kick?
Throw-in for Hertha close to the penalty box.
In the minute 81, Ball goes out of play for a Wolfsburg goal kick.
Jhon Cordoba (Hertha) wins the ball in the air but heads wide.
Goal kick for Wolfsburg at Olympiastadion.
In the minute 82, Bruno Labbadia is making the team's fourth substitution at Olympiastadion with Krzysztof Piatek replacing Jhon Cordoba.
Martin Petersen signals a Hertha throw-in in Wolfsburg's half.
Corner awarded to Hertha.
In the minute 84, Dedryck Boyata (Hertha) is first to the ball but his header is off-target.
Martin Petersen awards Wolfsburg a goal kick.
In the minute 85, Martin Petersen awards the home team a throw-in.
Can Hertha get the ball into an attacking position from this throw-in in Wolfsburg's half?
Felix Klaus is replacing Jerome Roussillon for Wolfsburg at Olympiastadion.
Free kick for Wolfsburg in the half of Hertha.
Throw-in for Hertha in their own half.
In the minute 86, Hertha's Peter Pekarik has been booked in Berlin.
Hertha awarded a free kick in their own half.
In the minute 88, Wolfsburg drive upfield and Xaver Schlager gets in a shot. The strike is blocked by a Hertha defender.
Free kick for Hertha in their own half.
Throw-in for Wolfsburg in the half of Hertha.
Xaver Schlager of Wolfsburg gets in a strike, but is off target.
Hertha have a goal kick.
Hertha awarded a free kick in their own half.
Goal kick for Wolfsburg at Olympiastadion.
In Berlin a free kick has been awarded the away team.
Martin Petersen will wait an extra 3 minutes before blowing the whistle to end the 2nd half.
Wolfsburg to take a throw-in in Hertha territory.
It's a goal kick for the home team in Berlin.
Full-time! The final score is 1-1.
Yannick Gerhardt (Wolfsburg) has been booked and must now be careful not to get a second yellow card.
Matteo Guendouzi (Hertha) has received a first yellow card.
The away team have replaced Wout Weghorst with Bartosz Bialek. This is the fourth substitution made today by Oliver Glasner.
